|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3763-01001201R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. WRT160N v2 serial numbers appear to start with '''CSE1'''. ==Links of Interest== ===Firmware projects=== *[http://github.com/leitec/openwrt-leitec Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWRT''' (''openwrt-leitec'')] ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt160n ''WRT160N series'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=44174 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] :(Note: ''DD-WRT'' doesn't currently support the WRT160Nv2) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|notsupported}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = https://github.com/leitec/openwrt-leitec |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = OpenWrt (leitec) }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== *[http://vectormm.net/routers/other-routers/59-vosstanovlenie-linksys-wrt-610n-cherez.html ''Serial Recovery'' on '''VectorMM'''] ====Serial Pinouts====
